com.parkingwang.heypermission.invoker

类 BasePermissionInvoker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingwang.heypermission.invoker.BasePermissionInvoker<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PermissionRequestExecutor

    public abstract class BasePermissionInvoker<T>
extends Object
implements PermissionRequestExecutor
    Delegate class to make permission calls.
    从以下版本开始:
    2017-11-30
    作者:
    黄浩杭 (huanghaohang@parkingwang.com)

      • getDelegate

        public final T getDelegate()

      • getContext

        public abstract Context getContext()
        Return the calling context
        返回:
        The calling context

      • delegateSuperClass

        public abstract <SubType extends T> Class<SubType> delegateSuperClass()
        The class object of T
        返回:
        T.class

      • shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale

        public abstract boolean shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale(String... permissions)
        Gets whether you should show UI with rationale for requesting a permission.
        参数:
        permissions - The permissions your app wants to request
        返回:
        Whether you should show permission rationale UI.
        另请参阅:
        Activity.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale(String)

      • startActivityForResult

        public abstract void startActivityForResult(Intent intent,
                                            int requestCode)
        Same as calling Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)
        参数:
        intent - The intent to start.
        requestCode - If >= 0, this code will be returned in onActivityResult() when the activity exits.

      • needHandleThisRequestCode

        public boolean needHandleThisRequestCode(int requestCode)
        Whether the invoker should handle the special request code.
        参数:
        requestCode - The request code.
        返回:
        True if should handle, otherwise false.
